help.title: SWGOH Registration
help.text: Register your Discord profile agaist your SWGOH profile for access to game-related commands
help.example:
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% add me <allyCode>
%PREFIX%%COMMAND% add <mention|discordId> <allyCode>

%PREFIX%%COMMAND% sync me
%PREFIX%%COMMAND% sync <mention|discordId>*

In the case that someone else registers on your allycode, the real accound owner can remove the existing registration with their playerId
(**Use direct message to bot in order to keep your playerId private**)
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% remove <allyCode> <playerId>*

queries.SET_REGISTER: INSERT INTO `swgoh` (`discordId`, `playerId`, `playerName`, `allyCode`, `playerGuild`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `playerName`=VALUES(`playerName`), `playerGuild`=VALUES(`playerGuild`), `updated`=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
